channel.title: priests on From Draenor With Love
channel.description: Recent content in priests on From Draenor With Love

item.title: iWrynny
item.description: Somewhere out there in Pandaria, there’s an armorsmith with one twisted sense of humor. Poor clueless little Anduin. Hands up if you saw him step onto that platform covered in Sha magic and walk right up to Garrosh, and thought to yourself “welp, I have a bad feeling about how this is going to turn out.” AND SURE ENOUGH. Should have listened to Dezco, kid. Even if he does wear babies as armor.

item.title: To the Ground
item.description: The idea of class abilities repeating endlessly was actually really hard to make a comic for, because there were so many awesome options! The mental images of Healing Rain, Hurricane or Fan of Knives duplicating over and over again are too funny. In the end, we decided to go with a theme preferred by Vid: CAKES (you can never have too much cake, according to her) and dead Warlocks. Also, the opportunity to have a sea of cakes was too great to pass up.
